name: Beneath (itch) (Kayde)
description:
First full release of Beneath, I call it the Wild Update. 

6 Endings, loads of places to explore, classic tracker bleeps and bloops on the tracks, for my FIRST EVER game I think its pretty cool. Made with GB Studio and Aesprite, it took around 2 weeks to make. Im adding more in the future, but for now this is the full official release. 

Special thanks to my Dad and Brother for playing first and helping me out, love you guys to bits.
